name: I Must Be Allowed To Speak (V)
Text: 'Deploy on table. Once per character, when you deploy Chewie, Lando, Leia, or Luke to a Tatooine site, may take any one card from Used Pile into hand; reshuffle. While Han is frozen, Rebels are immune to None Shall Pass. Once per game, may deploy a farm on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)',
